name: CLICK HERE TO REDIRECT TO: Chopstick Restaurant
text:
Combo - Order By Numbers
1. Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Chicken Chop Suey, Chicken Fried Rice
2. Sweet & Sour Wontons, Chicken Chop Suey, Chicken Fried Rice
3. Beef with Chinese Mixed Greens, Honey Garlic Spareribs, Chicken Fried Rice
4. Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Bon Bon Spareribs, Chicken Fried Rice
5. Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Honey Garlic Spareribs, Chicken Fried Rice
6. Bon Bon Spareribs, Chicken Chop Suey, Chicken Fried Rice
7. Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Beef with Chinese Mixed Greens, Chicken Fried Rice
8. Chicken Chop Suey, Sweet & Sour Shrimp, Chicken Fried Rice
9. Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Sweet & Sour Shrimp, Chicken Fried Rice
10. Honey Garlic Spareribs, Bon Bon Spareribs, Chicken Fried Rice
11. Honey Garlic Spareribs, Sweet & Sour Shrimp, Chicken Fried Rice
12. Beef with Chinese Mixed Greens, Sweet & Sour Shrimp, Chicken Fried Rice
13. Bon Bon Spareribs, Beef with Chinese Mixed Greens, Chicken Fried Rice
14. Bon Bon Spareribs, Sweet & Sour Shrimp, Chicken Fried Rice
15. Bon Bon Spareribs, Sweet & Sour Won Tons, Chicken Fried Rice
16. Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Sweet & Sour Won Tons, Chicken Fried Rice
LUNCHEON SPECIAL COMBINATIONS
Eat in – Take Out (11:30 am – 2 pm only)

Chicken Fried Rice AND Beef with Mixed Greens & Fried Won Tons
Select ONE of the Following:
A. Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls
B. Deep Fried Won Tons
C. Honey Garlic Spareribs
D. Bon Bon Spareribs
Full Orders

Cantonese Style Egg Roll

(Authentic, hot & spicy)
Szechuan Chicken, Beef or Pork
Szechuan Shrimps

Ma Po Tofu
Tofu with Mixed Greens
KUM PO STYLE
(This is real Szechuan, stir-fried in a tangy, flavorful garlic sauce with green & red peppers, mushrooms, onion, hot chili peppers, celery, sesame oil & roasted peanuts)
Chicken, Beef or Pork
Fresh Shrimp
SZECHUAN NOODLES
(With green & red peppers, onion, garlic, spicy bean sauce and your meat choice)

Special Full Course Family Dinners
Dinner For One
Consommé Soup, Egg Roll, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Chicken Chow Mein, Chicken Fried Rice
Dinner For Two
Consommé Soup, 2 Egg Roll, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Chicken Chow Mein, Chicken Fried Rice
Dinner for Three
Consommé Soup, 3 Egg Rolls, Honey Garlic Spareribs, Sweet & Sour Shrimps, Beef with Chinese Mixed Greens, Chicken Fried Rice
Dinner For Four
Consommé Soup, 4 Egg Rolls, Sizzling Bon Bon Spareribs, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Beef with Chinese Mixed Greens, Chicken Fried Rice
Dinner For Five
Consommé Soup, 5 Egg Rolls, Breaded Jumbo Shrimps, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Honey Garlic Spareribs, Beef with Chinese Mixed Greens, Beef Lo Mein, Chicken Fried Rice
Dinner For Six
Consommé Soup, 6 Egg Rolls, Sweet & Sour Shrimps, Sizzling Bon Bon Spareribs, Honey Garlic Ribs, Dai Jug Woey, Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls, Chopstick Special Fried Rice
Beverages
Juice / Soft Drink / Coffee / Tea / Chinese Tea
